This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Pressing an arrow key moves checked state in a radio button group. 
PASS Pressing an arrow key doesn't move checked state in a radio button group if click events are prevented. 
PASS Right arrow key should move checked state backward in RTL. 
PASS Down arrow key should move checked state forward regardless of RTL. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
